titleStmt.title: Love without interest, or, The man too hard for the master a comedy : as it was acted at the Theatre Royal by His Majesty's servants.
titleStmt.author: Pinkethman, William, d. 1725.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Arthur Bettesworth ... and Richard Ellison ...,

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to William Pinkethman. Cf. Baker, Biog. dram.; BM.
